prompt_base: raw photo, portrait of an (overweight middle-aged man:1.2), (pale yellow human skin tone:1.1), bald head, five o'clock shadow, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: visible pores on face, stubble and skin imperfections, detailed collar fabric, detailed neck fat texture, source palette preservation, identical color matching, subtle sweat, studio lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, perfect skin, clean shaven, flat lighting, low quality, messy clothing, handsome, muscular, (normal skin tone:0.5)
